h1: How Many Calories in 1 lb of Ground Beef?
assumptions: 80% lean / 20% fat ground beef, pan-broiled (cooked), excess fat drained; 1 lb = 454 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by leanness, cooking method, draining, and brand. Values are approximate; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 lb of cooked 80% lean ground beef provides ~1116 kcal and ~111 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 lb of 80% lean ground beef?
faqs.a: Approximately 1116 kcal when cooked and drained.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1 lb ground beef?
faqs.a: About 111 g of protein for cooked 80% lean ground beef.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes; broiling or draining fat reduces calories compared to frying without draining.

faqs.q: How many calories per 100 g of ground beef?
faqs.a: Around 246 kcal for cooked 80% lean ground beef per 100 g.
